backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking feature descriptions to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries for many frontend Tambola feature files, describing game logic, UI components, and voice features.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Partial deployment guide outlining prerequisites and basic build and deploy steps.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component coordinating game state, voice settings, auto-draw behavior, and rendering core UI sections.
frontend/src/features/tambola/components: Provides draw, reset, voice toggle, and auto‑draw controls with cooldown logic and UI layout.
Displays called numbers in a scrollable 9‑column grid with recent-first ordering.
Combines last number display, auto‑draw pause control, and call history into a single section.
Dialog for recording, playing, and deleting host voice clips for numbers 1–90 using IndexedDB.
Shows the most recently drawn number or a placeholder, with styling for game completion.
Provides a New Game button that triggers dialogs for incomplete boards and new-game confirmation before invoking reset or new-game handlers.
Renders a 1–90 grid highlighting called numbers with distinct styling.
Allows entering up to 15 numbers and verifies them against called numbers, showing success or detailed error results.
Displays voice announcement settings, voice initialization states, and troubleshooting hints with controls for reading mode and voice priority.
Shows troubleshooting steps for voice issues when enabled.
frontend/src/features/tambola/storage.ts: Defines localStorage persistence for Tambola game state and auto-draw settings with validation and default creators.
frontend/src/features/tambola/types.ts: Contains type definitions for Tambola game state, auto-draw settings, persisted data, and game actions.
frontend/src/features/tambola/useTambola: Custom hook managing Tambola game logic including draws, undo, auto‑draw control, resets, new games, and state persistence.
frontend/src/features/tambola/verify/par: Empty placeholder file for parsing entered numbers.
Parses spoken transcripts into up to 15 unique numbers (1–90), handling number words and compounds like “twenty one.”
Provides browser SpeechSynthesis helpers to load voices, select an English voice, check availability, and perform warm-up speech for TTS fallback.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/type: Defines types for reading modes, voice settings, source priority, and playback steps for announcements.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useH: Hook that records microphone audio for specific numbers and saves clips to IndexedDB.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useS: Hook wrapping browser SpeechRecognition to capture transcripts with error handling and control methods.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useV: Controls number announcements using recordings or TTS, building playback steps and handling failures.
Hook managing session-scoped voice settings including enable state, reading mode, and source priority.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useW: Initializes TTS and audio unlock steps for WebView environments with warm-up speech.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/voic: Handles audio context unlocking and playback of recorded audio blobs with cleanup and error handling.
IndexedDB storage for saving, loading, deleting, and listing host-recorded audio clips for numbers 1–90.
Provides default voice settings and clears stored settings to maintain a clean session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state, and handling login/logout flows.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including light/dark color palettes and background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/release/liveVersion.ts: Exports constants identifying the current live deployed version and its release date.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s deployment state, specifying rollback to draft 52, known issues, and feature requests.
